languages.text: {n}Ризза расплывается в широкой улыбке.{/n} "Вот старый пройдоха! Я-то думала, что он давно уж сгнил на рудниках, а старина Бахвал, оказывается, еще {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}брыкается{/d}! Много мы с ним в свое время интересных авантюр пережили и любопытных товаров награ... раздобыли. Дед просто так своими "приветами" не разбрасывается — видать, немало удружили вы ему. В честь этого у старой Риззы для вас будет особая скидка".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ризза расплывается в широкой улыбке.{/n} "Вот старый пройдоха! Я-то думала, что он давно уж сгнил на рудниках, а старина Бахвал, оказывается, еще брыкается! Много мы с ним, в свое время, интересных авантюр пережили и любопытных товаров награ... раздобыли. Дед просто так своими "приветами" не разбрасывается — видать, удружили вы ему некисло. В честь этого у старой Риззы для вас будет особая скидка".

languages.text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."
languages.original_text: {n}Ризза расплывается в широкой улыбке.{/n} "Вот старый пройдоха! В честь этого у старой Риззы для вас будет особая скидка".

Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

languages.text: {n}莱萨脸上露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“那个老王八蛋！我还以为巴卡瓦那个臭老头早就死在矿井里了呢，但看来他还是{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}活蹦乱跳{/d}的，是吧？我和他一起经历过很多有趣的困境。而且，哎哟，更别提我们一起偷——呃，我们一起弄到的那些奇妙的东西了。巴卡瓦可不会随便让什么人替他带好，他肯定是对你青睐有加。既然如此，老莱萨也给你打个特别的折扣吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨脸上露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“那个老王八蛋！我还以为巴卡瓦那个臭老头早就死在矿井里了呢，但看来他还是活蹦乱跳的，是吧？我和他一起经历过很多有趣的困境。而且，哎哟，更别提我们一起偷——呃，我们一起弄到的那些奇妙的东西了。巴卡瓦可不会随便让什么人替他带好，他肯定是对你青睐有加。既然如此，老莱萨也给你打个特别的折扣吧。”

languages.text: {n}Ryzza sonríe de oreja a oreja.{/n} «¡Ese viejo pillastre! Pensaba que habría muerto en las minas hace años, pero ¿dice que el viejo Bakhval sigue {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}vivito y coleando{/d}? Ese carcamal y yo hemos pasado por situaciones muy interesantes y ay, cuántas cosas raras y maravillosas hemos afa... adquirido. Bakhval no enviaría recuerdos con cualquiera, así que debe de haberle hecho un favor. Y eso significa que la vieja Ryzza le hará un descuento especial».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza sonríe de oreja a oreja.{/n} «¡Ese viejo pillastre! Pensaba que habría muerto en las minas hace años, pero ¿dice que el viejo Bakhval sigue vivito y coleando? Ese carcamal y yo hemos pasado por situaciones muy interesantes y ay, cuántas cosas raras y maravillosas hemos afa... adquirido. Bakhval no enviaría recuerdos con cualquiera, así que debe de haberle hecho un favor. Y eso significa que la vieja Ryzza le hará un descuento especial».

languages.text: {n}リザは満面の笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「あのじじい！とっくの昔に鉱山でくたばったと思ってたけど、バクヴァルじいさんは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}まだ生きてる{/d}んだね？あいつとは一緒に愉快な苦難をたくさん乗り越えてきたし、色んなものを盗…手に入れてきたよ。バクヴァルは滅多に人を信頼しないから、あんたはよっぽど気に入られたんだろう。じいさんに免じてあんたとは特別割引で売買してやるぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは満面の笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「あのじじい！とっくの昔に鉱山でくたばったと思ってたけど、バクヴァルじいさんは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}まだ生きてる{/d}んだね？あいつとは一緒に愉快な苦難をたくさん乗り越えてきたし、色んなものを盗…手に入れてきたよ。バクヴァルは滅多に人を信頼しないから、あんたはよっぽど気に入られたんだろう。じいさんに免じてあんたとは特別割引で売買してやるぞ」

languages.text: {n}Ryzzas Gesicht verzieht sich zu einem breiten Lächeln.{/n} "Der alte Mistkerl! Ich dachte, er wäre längst in den Minen abgekratzt, aber der alte Bakhval {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}lebt also noch{/d}, sagt Ihr? Wir beide haben viele interessante Sachen zusammen durchgestanden und viele schöne und wundervolle Dinge gesto... erworben. Bakhval würde nicht jedem auftragen, mir Grüße zu bestellen – Ihr müsst ihm einen großen Gefallen getan haben. Und deswegen wird Euch die alte Ryzza einen besonderen Rabatt gewähren."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzzas Gesicht verzieht sich zu einem breiten Lächeln.{/n} "Der alte Mistkerl! Ich dachte, er wäre längst in den Minen abgekratzt, aber der alte Bakhval lebt also noch, sagt Ihr? Wir beide haben viele interessante Sachen zusammen durchgestanden und viele schöne und wundervolle Dinge gesto... erworben. Bakhval würde nicht jedem auftragen, mir Grüße zu bestellen – Ihr müsst ihm einen großen Gefallen getan haben. Und deswegen wird Euch die alte Ryzza einen besonderen Rabatt gewähren."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Ryzza s'illumine d'un large sourire.{/n} « Cette vieille canaille ! Je pensais qu'il aurait cassé sa pipe dans les mines depuis bien longtemps, mais ce bon vieux Bakhval est {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}toujours en vie{/d}, vous dites ? On a connu pas mal de mésaventures plutôt intéressantes, lui et moi... Et je vous raconte pas tous les trucs étranges et incroyables qu'on a vo... chinés. Bakhval me ferait pas passer le bonjour par n'importe qui, vous avez dû lui rendre un fier service. Et rien que pour ça, Ryzza va vous faire une ristourne spéciale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Ryzza s'illumine d'un large sourire.{/n} « Cette vieille canaille ! Je pensais qu'il aurait cassé sa pipe dans les mines depuis bien longtemps, mais ce bon vieux Bakhval est toujours en vie, vous dites ? On a connu pas mal de mésaventures plutôt intéressantes, lui et moi... Et je vous raconte pas tous les trucs étranges et incroyables qu'on a vo... chinés. Bakhval me ferait pas passer le bonjour par n'importe qui, vous avez dû lui rendre un fier service. Et rien que pour ça, Ryzza va vous faire une ristourne spéciale. »

languages.text: {n}Ryzza'nın ağzı kulaklarına varıyor.{/n} "Serseri ihtiyara bak sen hele! Kaç yıl önce madenlerde geberdi gitti sanıyordum, meğer bizim ihtiyar Bakhval {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}hayatta mıymış{/d} ya? Onunla çok ilginç badireler atlattık, çok acayip ve harika mallar çald... Aldık. Bakhval öyle her önüne gelenle selam gönderecek adam değildir... Ona bir iyiliğin dokunmuştur. O hâlde koca Ryzza da sana özel indirim yapar."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's face breaks into a broad smile.{/n} "That old rascal! I thought he'd croaked in the mines a long time ago, but old man Bakhval's still {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_PiratesLetGo}alive and kicking{/d}, you say? Me and him have been through a lot of interesting scrapes together, and, oh, all the weird and wonderful things we've sto— acquired. Bakhval wouldn't send his regards along with just anyone — you must've done him a good turn. And because of that, old Ryzza's going to give you a special discount."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza'nın ağzı kulaklarına varıyor.{/n} "Serseri ihtiyara bak sen hele! Kaç yıl önce madenlerde geberdi gitti sanıyordum, meğer bizim ihtiyar Bakhval hayatta mıymış ya? Onunla çok ilginç badireler atlattık, çok acayip ve harika mallar çald... Elde ettik. Bakhval öyle her önüne gelenle selam gönderecek adam değildir... Ona bir iyiliğin dokunmuştur. O hâlde koca Ryzza da sana özel bir indirimi unutmaz."
